title: Mastery Tokens should be worth something even for people not chasing that magical master 7 emote
body:
So yeeeah, title is pretty descriptive but here we go.
I for one (and also friends I know) couldnt really imagine spending 2000 something BE twice just so I can have a different icon above my mastery points on load screen and spam crt+5.
So spending that much is out for me, the other option being a shard is quite unlikely lets be honest.

SOOO, now for my pitch: Mastery Tokens should be optionally DISENCHANTED for even a measly price of some BE 500-1000 maybe.
To combat farming this, getting mastery tokens should be time restricted. For example you get 2 ,disenchant them and couldnt get more on said Champion for a set period (Kinda like Chests)

Yeaaah, thats it 
Thanks for whoever read my little rant.

replies.body: Már a sokadik ilyen ember vagy. Miért írsz angolul egy láthatóan full magyar fórumra?
